headers.subject: [Issue 133208] New - SmokeParticleSystem: TimeLine compile error
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=-2.4 required=5.0 tests=BAYES_00,NO_RELAYS autolearn=disabled version=3.2.4

body.para: http://www.netbeans.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=133208 Issue #|133208 Summary|SmokeParticleSystem: TimeLine compile error product| Component|javafx Version|6.1 Platform|All URL| OS/Version|Windows XP Status|NEW Status whiteboard| Keywords| Resolution| Issue type|DEFECT Priority|P3 Subcomponent|samples Assigned to|misk Reported by|lfitzgerald

------- Additional comments from lfitzgerald@netbeans.org Fri Apr 18 14:29:43
+0000 2008 ------- Product Version: NetBeans IDE 6.1 RC2 (Build 200804170002) Java: 1.6.0_03; Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM 1.6.0_03-b05 System: Windows Vista version 6.0 running on x86; Cp1252; en_US (nb) plugin: CB 92 2008-04-18_14-24-29.zip Samples: Trunk 2008-04-18_02-01-55.zip Platform: 200 (Apr 16, 2008 9:49:22 AM) javafx_sdk-1_0-pre1-windows-i586.zip
Steps: 1. create Smoke Particle System project 2. Modify platform to point to javafx sdk 3. Run project

I get this compilation error init: deps-jar: Compiling 1 source file to C:\Users\Lark\Documents\NetBeansProjects\Smoke
Particle System\build\classes C:\Users\Lark\Documents\NetBeansProjects\Smoke Particle
System\src\particles\SmokeParticleSystem.fx:51: cannot find symbol symbol : variable TimeLine location: class particles.SmokeParticleSystem.CustomCanvas repeatCount: TimeLine.INDEFINITE 1 error C:\Users\Lark\Documents\NetBeansProjects\Smoke Particle
System\nbproject\build-impl.xml:363: JavaFX compile failed; see the compiler error output for details. BUILD FAILED (total time: 1 second)
Changing the line from: repeatCount: TimeLine.INDEFINITE To: repeatCount: timeline.INDEFINITE Resolves the build errors and I can run the project.
